Text.Page:
Have you seen Thulsa's Ksharan guards?

They seized the Ventral Command Center northeast of the furnace, and we can't retake the facility without dealing with them.

Kill off the Ksharan archpriests and vanguards and bring me their amulets. Think you can handle it, ?

I was rightâ€”I knew you'd make it!

We're one step closer to taking this place from the enemy. Nice work!

Bring me proof that you've defeated the Ksharans.

I know it's difficult, but I have great faith in you.
